title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 68.11 - Sale of business
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 68.11 - Sale of business

State Regulations

Unless otherwise prescribed by the Authority where, in
connection with a transfer or sale of a licensed business, the Authority issues
a license to the purchaser, who assumes the debts of a seller who is on the
delinquent list, the purchaser shall not purchase alcoholic beverages except
for cash and his name shall be published on the delinquent
list. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
68.11

Amended

New

York State Register August 14, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 33, eff. 8/14/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
